About

My Name is Samuel Johnson, The Programer behind White Fox Designs. I like to think of myself as a Dreamer who's Passion for Projects will never be quenched.
I am a Hard Worker who will always strive to create the best product not only for myself but for everyone I work with.
I am hoping that now with over 600 hours of experience coding that I can persue this Dream of mine and become a full stack Developer.

  • May 2020

    Our Humble Beginnings

    I am working at a small reselling buisiness when they ask me if they can update their website. And Finding my passion by accident

  • May 2021

    Preparing for a Change

    Taking an IT job at Heartland Payment Solutions, to Learn about office Culture and Online Customer Service.

  • August 2022

    Gaining the Skills

    Starting my Apprenticeship at General Assembly!

  • October 2022

    Persuing my Dreams!

    Armed with my newfound Tech skills Departing into the Tech World to make Dreams Come True.

  • Be Part
    Of The
    Story!
